snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio says the country has changed significantly since the last time Hillary Clinton was a candidate, “eight long years ago.”
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio defends his decision not to endorse Hillary Rodham Clinton for president until she takes stand on current issues like income inequality.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio says the country has changed significantly since the last time Hillary Clinton was a candidate, “eight long years ago.”

headline.main: De Blasio Seeks Updated Vision From Clinton for 2016
headline.print_headline: After 8 Years, de Blasio Seeks New Vision From Clinton
